hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Deku Stick#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #the Mirror Shield# and #a Heart Container#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bow#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Water Temple#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #4# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Market## has #3# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #the Serenade of Water#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Open your eyes.^Open your eyes.^Wake up, @.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold respectively...^ #a Heart Container# and #Din's Fire#.
